formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For thickness-based layers i: DL_i = γ_i · t_i where γ_i is unit weight and t_i is thickness. In LaTeX: 1) Thickness-based contribution: DL_i = \gamma_i \, t_i 2) Total dead load per unit area: DL_{\text{area}} = \sum_{i=1}^{n} \gamma_i \, t_i \;+\; \sum_{j=1}^{m} q_j 3) Total dead load over an area A: DL_{\text{total}} = DL_{\text{area}} \cdot A Unit notes: • US customary: γ in pcf, t in ft → DL_area in psf; A in ft² → DL_total in lb. • SI metric: γ in kN/m³, t in m → DL_area in kN/m²; A in m² → DL_total in kN.
